Reviews.Title: Buy at your own risk
Reviews.Author: Mara Twink
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone, but DOES NOT HAVE A WARRANTY. If you buy this phone you are buying a second-hand Vodophone phone (even though it has not been used) and you will have no support if anything goes wrong after 30 days. My phone's LCD screen failed after about four months, and PUT Group would not assist or replace the phone, and the warranty was not valid (well, I could have either gone to Europe and dealt with Vodophone, or paid BlackBerry ~$200 to fix it).I don't know why this listing still says that there is a warranty, because that is FALSE, and they need to update the information along with price of the phone accordingly.

Reviews.Title: Great in the first year
Reviews.Author: J. Fung
Reviews.Content: At first I thought it's great that each number only has 2 alphabets so texting will be easier. Soon enough, the keys start having problems. When entering someone's number or trying to navigated automated systems where you have to enter numbers, the keys sometimes enter twice or even three times even though you pressed a number once. It gets really annoying. I would recommend that you move onto another phone.
